function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding of resilience dimensions may lead to incomplete mitigation strategies for contagious diseases","Impact":"Ineffective response to disease outbreaks and potential for increased transmission","Mitigation":"Education and training on all dimensions of resilience, collaboration between disciplines","Technologies":"Data analytics for understanding community and economic dynamics","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, community leaders","Owner":"Public health agencies, academic institutions, interdisciplinary research groups"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of economic resilience may lead to neglect of economic factors in disease mitigation","Impact":"Underestimation of economic impact of disease outbreaks and lack of preparedness for economic consequences","Mitigation":"Education on economic resilience, integration of economic factors into public health planning","Technologies":"Economic modeling software, economic impact assessment tools","People":"Economists, public health planners, policymakers","Owner":"Economic development agencies, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Limited understanding of engineering resilience may result in inadequate infrastructure for disease response","Impact":"Vulnerability of technical systems to disease-related disruptions and failures","Mitigation":"Cross-disciplinary training on engineering resilience, integration of public health considerations in engineering design","Technologies":"Resilient infrastructure design tools, failure mode analysis software","People":"Engineers, public health professionals, infrastructure planners","Owner":"Engineering firms, public health agencies"}]}
